ex4D:argument.label: calendar
ex4D:argument.p: Name (title) or UID of calendar to register the event.

ex4D:argument.label: properties
ex4D:argument.p: Optional. Any other property to set for the new event. Setting the calendar here will not over-write $1.

ex4D:return-value.label: eventId
ex4D:return-value.p: Empty string means the event could not be created. More information may be available in the console.

ex4D:argument.label: date
ex4D:argument.p: Optional. Use to specify an instance of a recurring event.

ex4D:argument.label: date
ex4D:argument.p: Optional. Use to specify an instance of a recurring event.

ex4D:argument.p: Optional. Use to specify an instance of a recurring event.
